channel.title: What do i need to run richscape client?
channel.description:
when i click run this comes up
exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: egui press any key to continue . . .
any 1 know what im missing for it?

item.title: What do i need to run richscape client?
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

[quote=“duhoverdrive, post:1, topic:228490”]try downloading pureman0194’s compiler and server runner, edited by me to support the newer versions of java, i have richscape and it works like a charm. Here is link -

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,300430.0.html[/quote]

Wrong. Dont post some noob answers. Read the topic first.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i need to run richscape client?

item.title: What do i need to run richscape client?
item.dc:creator: @public_void_mscpidio public void mscpidiots()
item.description:
@public_void_mscpidio wrote:

[quote=“Master Programmer., post:7, topic:228477”][quote author=endless hood link=topic=300414.msg2411283#msg2411283 date=1219943560]

theres a realy simpile awnser to that question , its: extract it to desktop

Wrong.

and whys that so?
[/quote]
Extracting it to the desktop does nothing different than extracting it to my documents as there both in folders and My Documents is no diff than Desktop. Other then the Recycle bin file and stuff.[/quote]And how do you know that he has it extracted at all?

Read full topic
